languages.text: "Мое имя было на слуху задолго до того, как я стал{mf||а} Вольным Торговцем! Подобные мне не стоят в очереди — нам распахивают двери и с поклоном расстилают ковровую дорожку, куда бы мы не ступали!"
"My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"
languages.original_text: "Мое имя было на слуху задолго до того, как я стал{mf||а} Вольным Торговцем! Подобные мне не стоят в очереди — нам распахивают двери и с поклоном расстилают ковровую дорожку, куда бы мы не ступали!"

traits.locale_text: "My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"
"My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"
"My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"
"My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"

languages.text: “早在我成为行商浪人之前，我的名字就早已广为人知！像我这样的人从来都不需要排队，因为无论我们走到哪里，大门都会向我们敞开，人们会为我们铺上红地毯！”
languages.original_text: "My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"

traits.locale_text: “早在我成为行商浪人之前，我的名字就早已广为人知！像我这样的人从来都不需要排队，因为无论我们走到哪里，大门都会向我们敞开，人们会为我们铺上红地毯！”

languages.text: "Mein Name war schon lange, bevor ich {mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin} geworden bin, weithin bekannt! Leute wie ich stellen sich nicht in eine Warteschlange! Wohin wir auch gehen, werden Türen weit geöffnet und der rote Teppich wird ausgerollt!"
languages.original_text: "My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"

traits.locale_text: "Mein Name war schon lange, bevor ich {mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin} geworden bin, weithin bekannt! Leute wie ich stellen sich nicht in eine Warteschlange! Wohin wir auch gehen, werden Türen weit geöffnet und der rote Teppich wird ausgerollt!"

languages.text: « Mon nom était déjà célèbre bien avant que je devienne {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Les gens comme moi ne font pas la queue. Où que nous allions, on s'empresse de nous dérouler le tapis rouge et de nous ouvrir les portes ! »
languages.original_text: "My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"

traits.locale_text: « Mon nom était déjà célèbre bien avant que je devienne {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Les gens comme moi ne font pas la queue. Où que nous allions, on s'empresse de nous dérouler le tapis rouge et de nous ouvrir les portes ! »

languages.text: «¡Mi nombre ya era conocido antes de que me convirtiera en Comerciante Independiente! La gente como yo no hace cola: ¡donde vamos, se nos abren las puertas y se extiende la alfombra roja!».
languages.original_text: "My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi nombre ya era conocido antes de que me convirtiera en Comerciante Independiente! La gente como yo no hace cola: ¡donde vamos, se nos abren las puertas y se extiende la alfombra roja!».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}の名は、自由開拓者になるずっと前から知れ渡っていた！{mf|俺|私}の様な人間は、列になど並ばない。何処へ行ってもドアは広く開けられ、レッドカーペットが広げられるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}の名は、自由開拓者になるずっと前から知れ渡っていた！{mf|俺|私}の様な人間は、列になど並ばない。何処へ行ってもドアは広く開けられ、レッドカーペットが広げられるのだ！」

languages.text: "Daha Hür Tacir olmadan bile adımı duymayan yoktu! Benim gibi insanlar kuyrukta sıra beklemez... Bizim gittiğimiz her yerde kapılar ardına kadar açılır, önümüze kırmızı halı serilir!"
languages.original_text: "My name was widely known long before I became a Rogue Trader! People like me do not queue — wherever we go, doors are thrown open wide for us and the red carpet rolled out!"

traits.locale_text: "Daha Hür Tacir olmadan bile adımı duymayan yoktu! Benim gibi insanlar kuyrukta sıra beklemez... Bizim gittiğimiz her yerde kapılar ardına kadar açılır, önümüze kırmızı halı serilir!"
